wikipedia_page.main: Michael Adams (born 23 August 1999) is a British television personality. He has appeared on various programmes for CBBC, including Show Me What You're Made Of with Stacey Dooley.

response: *J. Michael Adams (1947–2012), president of Fairleigh Dickinson University
*Michael Adams (journalist) (1920–2005), who worked for the BBC
*Michael Adams (Canadian writer), contributor to The Walrus
*Michael Adams (stunt performer) (1950–2010), actor, stunt performer and stunt coordinator
*Michael Adams (Kentucky politician) (born 1976), Secretary of State of Kentucky
*Michael Adams (Wisconsin politician) (1831–1903), American businessman and politician
*Michael Adams, co-founder of the Canadian polling firm Environics
*Michael Adams (RAF officer) (born 1934), Royal Air Force officer

link_mentions.page: Show Me What You're Made Of
response: The show launched careers for EastEnders actress Milly Zero, Callum Scott Howells and Michael Adams.
